######################################
####### GENERATED CODE WARNING #######
######################################
# This file is generated code - any
# changes made directly to these files
# will likely be lost on future
# updates. If you need to tweak the
# functionality in this file, please
# contact wtchappell ('the witch') for
# help in improving its functionality.
######################################
####### GENERATED CODE WARNING #######
######################################
# nova_legion
is_nova_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_nova_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.nova_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_nova_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_nova_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_nova_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_nova_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_nova_legion_leader_tt
		is_nova_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_nova_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_nova_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_nova_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

nova_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = nova_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.nova_legion_leader
	}
}

does_nova_legion_exist = {
	nova_legion_exists = yes
}

nova_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = nova_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { nova_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_nova_legion_not_exist = {
	nova_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_nova_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_nova_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_nova_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_nova_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_nova_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_nova_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_nova_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_nova_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_nova_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_nova_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_nova_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_nova_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_nova_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_nova_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_nova_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_nova_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_nova_legion_tt
		borders_nova_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_nova_legion = {
	can_join_nova_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_nova_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_nova_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_nova_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nova_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_nova_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.nova_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.nova_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nova_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nova_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_nova_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# chosen_ones
is_chosen_ones_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_chosen_ones_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.chosen_ones_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_chosen_ones_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_chosen_ones_member_tt
		NOT = { is_chosen_ones_member = yes }
	}
}

is_chosen_ones_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_chosen_ones_leader_tt
		is_chosen_ones_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_chosen_ones_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_chosen_ones_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_chosen_ones_leader = yes }
	}
}

chosen_ones_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = chosen_ones_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.chosen_ones_leader
	}
}

does_chosen_ones_exist = {
	chosen_ones_exists = yes
}

chosen_ones_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = chosen_ones_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { chosen_ones_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_chosen_ones_not_exist = {
	chosen_ones_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_chosen_ones = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_chosen_ones_tt
		any_country = {
			is_chosen_ones_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_chosen_ones = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_chosen_ones_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_chosen_ones_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_chosen_ones = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_chosen_ones_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_chosen_ones_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_chosen_ones = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_chosen_ones_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_chosen_ones_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_chosen_ones_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_chosen_ones_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_chosen_ones_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_chosen_ones = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_chosen_ones_tt
		borders_chosen_ones = no
	}
}

can_join_chosen_ones = {
	can_join_chosen_ones_generic = yes
	can_join_chosen_ones_specific = yes
}

can_join_chosen_ones_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_chosen_ones = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_chosen_ones = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_chosen_ones }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.chosen_ones_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.chosen_ones_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_chosen_ones = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_chosen_ones_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_chosen_ones_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_lanius_horde_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_lanius_horde_member = yes
		}
	}
}

			any_country = {

				OR = {

	}

can_join_lanius_horde = {
	can_join_lanius_horde_generic = yes
	can_join_lanius_horde_specific = yes
}

can_join_lanius_horde_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_lanius_horde = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lanius_horde = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_lanius_horde }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.lanius_horde_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.lanius_horde_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lanius_horde_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_lanius_horde_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}

# big_mt
is_big_mt_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_big_mt_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.big_mt_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_big_mt_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_big_mt_member_tt
		NOT = { is_big_mt_member = yes }
	}
}

is_big_mt_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_big_mt_leader_tt
		is_big_mt_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_big_mt_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_big_mt_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_big_mt_leader = yes }
	}
}

big_mt_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = big_mt_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.big_mt_leader
	}
}

does_big_mt_exist = {
	big_mt_exists = yes
}

big_mt_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = big_mt_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { big_mt_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_big_mt_not_exist = {
	big_mt_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_big_mt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_big_mt_tt
		any_country = {
			is_big_mt_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_big_mt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_big_mt_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_big_mt_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_big_mt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_big_mt_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_big_mt_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_big_mt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_big_mt_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_big_mt_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_big_mt_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_big_mt_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_big_mt_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_big_mt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_big_mt_tt
		borders_big_mt = no
	}
}

can_join_big_mt = {
	can_join_big_mt_generic = yes
	can_join_big_mt_specific = yes
}

can_join_big_mt_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_big_mt = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_big_mt = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_big_mt }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.big_mt_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.big_mt_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_big_mt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_big_mt_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_big_mt_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# boneyard_brotherhood
is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_boneyard_brotherhood_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.boneyard_brotherhood_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_boneyard_brotherhood_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_boneyard_brotherhood_member_tt
		NOT = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes }
	}
}

is_boneyard_brotherhood_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_boneyard_brotherhood_leader_tt
		is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_boneyard_brotherhood_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_boneyard_brotherhood_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_leader = yes }
	}
}

boneyard_brotherhood_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = boneyard_brotherhood_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.boneyard_brotherhood_leader
	}
}

does_boneyard_brotherhood_exist = {
	boneyard_brotherhood_exists = yes
}

boneyard_brotherhood_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = boneyard_brotherhood_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { boneyard_brotherhood_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_boneyard_brotherhood_not_exist = {
	boneyard_brotherhood_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_boneyard_brotherhood = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_boneyard_brotherhood_tt
		any_country = {
			is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_boneyard_brotherhood = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_boneyard_brotherhood_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_boneyard_brotherhood = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_boneyard_brotherhood_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_boneyard_brotherhood = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_boneyard_brotherhood_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_boneyard_brotherhood_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_boneyard_brotherhood_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_boneyard_brotherhood = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_boneyard_brotherhood_tt
		borders_boneyard_brotherhood = no
	}
}

can_join_boneyard_brotherhood = {
	can_join_boneyard_brotherhood_generic = yes
	can_join_boneyard_brotherhood_specific = yes
}

can_join_boneyard_brotherhood_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_boneyard_brotherhood = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_boneyard_brotherhood = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_boneyard_brotherhood }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.boneyard_brotherhood_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.boneyard_brotherhood_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_boneyard_brotherhood = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_boneyard_brotherhood_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_boneyard_brotherhood_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# united_front
is_united_front_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_united_front_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.united_front_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_united_front_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_united_front_member_tt
		NOT = { is_united_front_member = yes }
	}
}

is_united_front_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_united_front_leader_tt
		is_united_front_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_united_front_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_united_front_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_united_front_leader = yes }
	}
}

united_front_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = united_front_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.united_front_leader
	}
}

does_united_front_exist = {
	united_front_exists = yes
}

united_front_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = united_front_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { united_front_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_united_front_not_exist = {
	united_front_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_united_front = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_united_front_tt
		any_country = {
			is_united_front_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_united_front = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_united_front_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_united_front_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_united_front = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_united_front_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_united_front_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_united_front = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_united_front_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_united_front_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_united_front_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_united_front_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_united_front_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_united_front = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_united_front_tt
		borders_united_front = no
	}
}

can_join_united_front = {
	can_join_united_front_generic = yes
	can_join_united_front_specific = yes
}

can_join_united_front_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_united_front = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_united_front = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_united_front }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.united_front_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.united_front_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_united_front = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_united_front_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_united_front_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# western_brotherhood_of_steel
is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.western_brotherhood_of_steel_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member_tt
		NOT = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes }
	}
}

is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader_tt
		is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = yes }
	}
}

western_brotherhood_of_steel_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = western_brotherhood_of_steel_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader
	}
}

does_western_brotherhood_of_steel_exist = {
	western_brotherhood_of_steel_exists = yes
}

western_brotherhood_of_steel_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = western_brotherhood_of_steel_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { western_brotherhood_of_steel_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_western_brotherhood_of_steel_not_exist = {
	western_brotherhood_of_steel_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel_tt
		any_country = {
			is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_western_brotherhood_of_steel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_western_brotherhood_of_steel_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_western_brotherhood_of_steel_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_western_brotherhood_of_steel_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_western_brotherhood_of_steel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_western_brotherhood_of_steel_tt
		borders_western_brotherhood_of_steel = no
	}
}

can_join_western_brotherhood_of_steel = {
	can_join_western_brotherhood_of_steel_generic = yes
	can_join_western_brotherhood_of_steel_specific = yes
}

can_join_western_brotherhood_of_steel_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_western_brotherhood_of_steel }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_western_brotherhood_of_steel_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# caesars_legion
is_caesars_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_caesars_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.caesars_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_caesars_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_caesars_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_caesars_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_caesars_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_caesars_legion_leader_tt
		is_caesars_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_caesars_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_caesars_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_caesars_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

caesars_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = caesars_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.caesars_legion_leader
	}
}

does_caesars_legion_exist = {
	caesars_legion_exists = yes
}

caesars_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = caesars_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { caesars_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_caesars_legion_not_exist = {
	caesars_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_caesars_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_caesars_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_caesars_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_caesars_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_caesars_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_caesars_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_caesars_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_caesars_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_caesars_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_caesars_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_caesars_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_caesars_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_caesars_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_caesars_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_caesars_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_caesars_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_caesars_legion_tt
		borders_caesars_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_caesars_legion = {
	can_join_caesars_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_caesars_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_caesars_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_caesars_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_caesars_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_caesars_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.caesars_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.caesars_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_caesars_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_caesars_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_caesars_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# children_of_mexico
is_children_of_mexico_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_children_of_mexico_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.children_of_mexico_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_children_of_mexico_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_children_of_mexico_member_tt
		NOT = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes }
	}
}

is_children_of_mexico_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_children_of_mexico_leader_tt
		is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_children_of_mexico_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_children_of_mexico_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_children_of_mexico_leader = yes }
	}
}

children_of_mexico_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = children_of_mexico_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.children_of_mexico_leader
	}
}

does_children_of_mexico_exist = {
	children_of_mexico_exists = yes
}

children_of_mexico_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = children_of_mexico_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { children_of_mexico_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_children_of_mexico_not_exist = {
	children_of_mexico_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_children_of_mexico = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_children_of_mexico_tt
		any_country = {
			is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_children_of_mexico = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_children_of_mexico_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_children_of_mexico = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_children_of_mexico_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_children_of_mexico = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_children_of_mexico_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_children_of_mexico_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_children_of_mexico_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_children_of_mexico_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_children_of_mexico = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_children_of_mexico_tt
		borders_children_of_mexico = no
	}
}

can_join_children_of_mexico = {
	can_join_children_of_mexico_generic = yes
	can_join_children_of_mexico_specific = yes
}

can_join_children_of_mexico_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_children_of_mexico = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_children_of_mexico = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_children_of_mexico }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.children_of_mexico_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.children_of_mexico_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_children_of_mexico = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_children_of_mexico_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_children_of_mexico_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# children_of_the_gate
is_children_of_the_gate_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_children_of_the_gate_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.children_of_the_gate_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_children_of_the_gate_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_children_of_the_gate_member_tt
		NOT = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes }
	}
}

is_children_of_the_gate_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_children_of_the_gate_leader_tt
		is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_children_of_the_gate_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_children_of_the_gate_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_children_of_the_gate_leader = yes }
	}
}

children_of_the_gate_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = children_of_the_gate_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.children_of_the_gate_leader
	}
}

does_children_of_the_gate_exist = {
	children_of_the_gate_exists = yes
}

children_of_the_gate_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = children_of_the_gate_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { children_of_the_gate_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_children_of_the_gate_not_exist = {
	children_of_the_gate_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_children_of_the_gate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_children_of_the_gate_tt
		any_country = {
			is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_children_of_the_gate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_children_of_the_gate_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_children_of_the_gate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_children_of_the_gate_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_children_of_the_gate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_children_of_the_gate_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_children_of_the_gate_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_children_of_the_gate_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_children_of_the_gate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_children_of_the_gate_tt
		borders_children_of_the_gate = no
	}
}

can_join_children_of_the_gate = {
	can_join_children_of_the_gate_generic = yes
	can_join_children_of_the_gate_specific = yes
}

can_join_children_of_the_gate_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_children_of_the_gate = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_children_of_the_gate = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_children_of_the_gate }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.children_of_the_gate_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.children_of_the_gate_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_children_of_the_gate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_children_of_the_gate_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_children_of_the_gate_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# daikatana
is_daikatana_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_daikatana_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.daikatana_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_daikatana_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_daikatana_member_tt
		NOT = { is_daikatana_member = yes }
	}
}

is_daikatana_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_daikatana_leader_tt
		is_daikatana_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_daikatana_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_daikatana_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_daikatana_leader = yes }
	}
}

daikatana_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = daikatana_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.daikatana_leader
	}
}

does_daikatana_exist = {
	daikatana_exists = yes
}

daikatana_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = daikatana_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { daikatana_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_daikatana_not_exist = {
	daikatana_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_daikatana = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_daikatana_tt
		any_country = {
			is_daikatana_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_daikatana = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_daikatana_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_daikatana_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_daikatana = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_daikatana_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_daikatana_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_daikatana = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_daikatana_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_daikatana_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_daikatana_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_daikatana_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_daikatana_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_daikatana = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_daikatana_tt
		borders_daikatana = no
	}
}

can_join_daikatana = {
	can_join_daikatana_generic = yes
	can_join_daikatana_specific = yes
}

can_join_daikatana_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_daikatana = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_daikatana = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_daikatana }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.daikatana_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.daikatana_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_daikatana = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_daikatana_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_daikatana_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# daughters_of_hecate
is_daughters_of_hecate_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_daughters_of_hecate_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.daughters_of_hecate_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_daughters_of_hecate_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_daughters_of_hecate_member_tt
		NOT = { is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes }
	}
}

is_daughters_of_hecate_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_daughters_of_hecate_leader_tt
		is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_daughters_of_hecate_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_daughters_of_hecate_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_daughters_of_hecate_leader = yes }
	}
}

daughters_of_hecate_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = daughters_of_hecate_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.daughters_of_hecate_leader
	}
}

does_daughters_of_hecate_exist = {
	daughters_of_hecate_exists = yes
}

daughters_of_hecate_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = daughters_of_hecate_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { daughters_of_hecate_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_daughters_of_hecate_not_exist = {
	daughters_of_hecate_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_daughters_of_hecate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_daughters_of_hecate_tt
		any_country = {
			is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_daughters_of_hecate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_daughters_of_hecate_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_daughters_of_hecate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_daughters_of_hecate_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_daughters_of_hecate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_daughters_of_hecate_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_daughters_of_hecate_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_daughters_of_hecate_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_daughters_of_hecate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_daughters_of_hecate_tt
		borders_daughters_of_hecate = no
	}
}

can_join_daughters_of_hecate = {
	can_join_daughters_of_hecate_generic = yes
	can_join_daughters_of_hecate_specific = yes
}

can_join_daughters_of_hecate_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_daughters_of_hecate = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_daughters_of_hecate = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_daughters_of_hecate }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.daughters_of_hecate_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.daughters_of_hecate_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_daughters_of_hecate = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_daughters_of_hecate_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_daughters_of_hecate_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# denver_defense_network
is_denver_defense_network_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_denver_defense_network_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.denver_defense_network_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_denver_defense_network_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_denver_defense_network_member_tt
		NOT = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes }
	}
}

is_denver_defense_network_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_denver_defense_network_leader_tt
		is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_denver_defense_network_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_denver_defense_network_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_denver_defense_network_leader = yes }
	}
}

denver_defense_network_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = denver_defense_network_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.denver_defense_network_leader
	}
}

does_denver_defense_network_exist = {
	denver_defense_network_exists = yes
}

denver_defense_network_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = denver_defense_network_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { denver_defense_network_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_denver_defense_network_not_exist = {
	denver_defense_network_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_denver_defense_network = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_denver_defense_network_tt
		any_country = {
			is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_denver_defense_network = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_denver_defense_network_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_denver_defense_network = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_denver_defense_network_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_denver_defense_network = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_denver_defense_network_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_denver_defense_network_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_denver_defense_network_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_denver_defense_network_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_denver_defense_network = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_denver_defense_network_tt
		borders_denver_defense_network = no
	}
}

can_join_denver_defense_network = {
	can_join_denver_defense_network_generic = yes
	can_join_denver_defense_network_specific = yes
}

can_join_denver_defense_network_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_denver_defense_network = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_denver_defense_network = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_denver_defense_network }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.denver_defense_network_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.denver_defense_network_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_denver_defense_network = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_denver_defense_network_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_denver_defense_network_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# earth_and_sky
is_earth_and_sky_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_earth_and_sky_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.earth_and_sky_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_earth_and_sky_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_earth_and_sky_member_tt
		NOT = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes }
	}
}

is_earth_and_sky_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_earth_and_sky_leader_tt
		is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_earth_and_sky_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_earth_and_sky_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_earth_and_sky_leader = yes }
	}
}

earth_and_sky_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = earth_and_sky_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.earth_and_sky_leader
	}
}

does_earth_and_sky_exist = {
	earth_and_sky_exists = yes
}

earth_and_sky_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = earth_and_sky_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { earth_and_sky_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_earth_and_sky_not_exist = {
	earth_and_sky_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_earth_and_sky = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_earth_and_sky_tt
		any_country = {
			is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_earth_and_sky = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_earth_and_sky_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_earth_and_sky = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_earth_and_sky_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_earth_and_sky = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_earth_and_sky_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_earth_and_sky_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_earth_and_sky_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_earth_and_sky_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_earth_and_sky = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_earth_and_sky_tt
		borders_earth_and_sky = no
	}
}

can_join_earth_and_sky = {
	can_join_earth_and_sky_generic = yes
	can_join_earth_and_sky_specific = yes
}

can_join_earth_and_sky_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_earth_and_sky = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_earth_and_sky = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_earth_and_sky }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.earth_and_sky_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.earth_and_sky_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_earth_and_sky = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_earth_and_sky_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_earth_and_sky_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_empire_of_salt_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.empire_of_salt_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_empire_of_salt_member_tt
		NOT = { is_empire_of_salt_member = yes }
	}
}

is_empire_of_salt_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_empire_of_salt_leader_tt
		is_empire_of_salt_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_empire_of_salt_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_empire_of_salt_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_empire_of_salt_leader = yes }
	}
}

empire_of_salt_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = empire_of_salt_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.empire_of_salt_leader
	}
}

does_empire_of_salt_exist = {
	empire_of_salt_exists = yes
}

empire_of_salt_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = empire_of_salt_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { empire_of_salt_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_empire_of_salt_not_exist = {
	empire_of_salt_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_empire_of_salt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_empire_of_salt_tt
		any_country = {
			is_empire_of_salt_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_empire_of_salt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_empire_of_salt_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_empire_of_salt_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_empire_of_salt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_empire_of_salt_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_empire_of_salt_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_empire_of_salt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_empire_of_salt_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_empire_of_salt_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_empire_of_salt_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_empire_of_salt_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_empire_of_salt_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_empire_of_salt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_empire_of_salt_tt
		borders_empire_of_salt = no
	}
}

can_join_empire_of_salt = {
	can_join_empire_of_salt_generic = yes
	can_join_empire_of_salt_specific = yes
}

can_join_empire_of_salt_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_empire_of_salt = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_empire_of_salt = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_empire_of_salt }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.empire_of_salt_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.empire_of_salt_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_empire_of_salt = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_empire_of_salt_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_empire_of_salt_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# equestria
is_equestria_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_equestria_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.equestria_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_equestria_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_equestria_member_tt
		NOT = { is_equestria_member = yes }
	}
}

is_equestria_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_equestria_leader_tt
		is_equestria_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_equestria_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_equestria_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_equestria_leader = yes }
	}
}

equestria_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = equestria_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.equestria_leader
	}
}

does_equestria_exist = {
	equestria_exists = yes
}

equestria_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = equestria_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { equestria_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_equestria_not_exist = {
	equestria_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_equestria = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_equestria_tt
		any_country = {
			is_equestria_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_equestria = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_equestria_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_equestria_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_equestria = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_equestria_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_equestria_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_equestria = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_equestria_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_equestria_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_equestria_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_equestria_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_equestria_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_equestria = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_equestria_tt
		borders_equestria = no
	}
}

can_join_equestria = {
	can_join_equestria_generic = yes
	can_join_equestria_specific = yes
}

can_join_equestria_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_equestria = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_equestria = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_equestria }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.equestria_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.equestria_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_equestria = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_equestria_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_equestria_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# faithful
is_faithful_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_faithful_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.faithful_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_faithful_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_faithful_member_tt
		NOT = { is_faithful_member = yes }
	}
}

is_faithful_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_faithful_leader_tt
		is_faithful_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_faithful_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_faithful_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_faithful_leader = yes }
	}
}

faithful_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = faithful_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.faithful_leader
	}
}

does_faithful_exist = {
	faithful_exists = yes
}

faithful_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = faithful_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { faithful_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_faithful_not_exist = {
	faithful_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_faithful = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_faithful_tt
		any_country = {
			is_faithful_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_faithful = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_faithful_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_faithful_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_faithful = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_faithful_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_faithful_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_faithful = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_faithful_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_faithful_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_faithful_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_faithful_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_faithful_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_faithful = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_faithful_tt
		borders_faithful = no
	}
}

can_join_faithful = {
	can_join_faithful_generic = yes
	can_join_faithful_specific = yes
}

can_join_faithful_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_faithful = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_faithful = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_faithful }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.faithful_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.faithful_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_faithful = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_faithful_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_faithful_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# fantasma_cartel
is_fantasma_cartel_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_fantasma_cartel_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.fantasma_cartel_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_fantasma_cartel_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_fantasma_cartel_member_tt
		NOT = { is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes }
	}
}

is_fantasma_cartel_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_fantasma_cartel_leader_tt
		is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_fantasma_cartel_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_fantasma_cartel_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_fantasma_cartel_leader = yes }
	}
}

fantasma_cartel_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = fantasma_cartel_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.fantasma_cartel_leader
	}
}

does_fantasma_cartel_exist = {
	fantasma_cartel_exists = yes
}

fantasma_cartel_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = fantasma_cartel_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { fantasma_cartel_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_fantasma_cartel_not_exist = {
	fantasma_cartel_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_fantasma_cartel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_fantasma_cartel_tt
		any_country = {
			is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_fantasma_cartel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_fantasma_cartel_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_fantasma_cartel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_fantasma_cartel_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_fantasma_cartel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_fantasma_cartel_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_fantasma_cartel_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_fantasma_cartel_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_fantasma_cartel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_fantasma_cartel_tt
		borders_fantasma_cartel = no
	}
}

can_join_fantasma_cartel = {
	can_join_fantasma_cartel_generic = yes
	can_join_fantasma_cartel_specific = yes
}

can_join_fantasma_cartel_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_fantasma_cartel = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_fantasma_cartel = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_fantasma_cartel }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.fantasma_cartel_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.fantasma_cartel_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_fantasma_cartel = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_fantasma_cartel_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_fantasma_cartel_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_glass_league_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.glass_league_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_glass_league_member_tt
		NOT = { is_glass_league_member = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_glass_league_leader_tt
		is_glass_league_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_glass_league_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_glass_league_leader = yes }
	}
}

glass_league_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = glass_league_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.glass_league_leader
	}
}

	glass_league_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = glass_league_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { glass_league_exists = yes }
	}
}

	glass_league_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_glass_league_tt
		any_country = {
			is_glass_league_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_glass_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_glass_league_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_glass_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_glass_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_glass_league_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_glass_league_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_glass_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_glass_league_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_glass_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_glass_league_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_glass_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_glass_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_glass_league_tt
		borders_glass_league = no
	}
}

can_join_glass_league = {
	can_join_glass_league_generic = yes
	can_join_glass_league_specific = yes
}

can_join_glass_league_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_glass_league = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_glass_league = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_glass_league }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.glass_league_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.glass_league_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_glass_league_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_glass_league_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# great_federation
is_great_federation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_great_federation_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.great_federation_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_great_federation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_great_federation_member_tt
		NOT = { is_great_federation_member = yes }
	}
}

is_great_federation_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_great_federation_leader_tt
		is_great_federation_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_great_federation_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_great_federation_leader = yes }
	}
}

great_federation_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = great_federation_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.great_federation_leader
	}
}

	great_federation_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = great_federation_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { great_federation_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_great_federation_not_exist = {
	great_federation_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_great_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_great_federation_tt
		any_country = {
			is_great_federation_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_great_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_great_federation_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_great_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_great_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_great_federation_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_great_federation_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_great_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_great_federation_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_great_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_great_federation_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_great_federation_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_great_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_great_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_great_federation_tt
		borders_great_federation = no
	}
}

can_join_great_federation = {
	can_join_great_federation_generic = yes
	can_join_great_federation_specific = yes
}

can_join_great_federation_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_great_federation = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_federation = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_great_federation }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.great_federation_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.great_federation_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_federation_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_great_federation_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# great_plains_federation
is_great_plains_federation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_great_plains_federation_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.great_plains_federation_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_great_plains_federation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_great_plains_federation_member_tt
		NOT = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes }
	}
}

is_great_plains_federation_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_great_plains_federation_leader_tt
		is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_great_plains_federation_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_great_plains_federation_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_great_plains_federation_leader = yes }
	}
}

great_plains_federation_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = great_plains_federation_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.great_plains_federation_leader
	}
}

	great_plains_federation_exists = yes
}

great_plains_federation_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = great_plains_federation_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { great_plains_federation_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_great_plains_federation_not_exist = {
	great_plains_federation_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_great_plains_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_great_plains_federation_tt
		any_country = {
			is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_great_plains_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_great_plains_federation_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_great_plains_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_great_plains_federation_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_great_plains_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_great_plains_federation_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_great_plains_federation_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_great_plains_federation_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_great_plains_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_great_plains_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_great_plains_federation_tt
		borders_great_plains_federation = no
	}
}

can_join_great_plains_federation = {
	can_join_great_plains_federation_generic = yes
	can_join_great_plains_federation_specific = yes
}

can_join_great_plains_federation_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_great_plains_federation = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_plains_federation = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_great_plains_federation }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.great_plains_federation_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.great_plains_federation_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_plains_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_plains_federation_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_great_plains_federation_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# jungle_pact
is_jungle_pact_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_jungle_pact_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.jungle_pact_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_jungle_pact_member_tt
		NOT = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes }
	}
}

is_jungle_pact_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_jungle_pact_leader_tt
		is_jungle_pact_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_jungle_pact_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_jungle_pact_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_jungle_pact_leader = yes }
	}
}

jungle_pact_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = jungle_pact_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.jungle_pact_leader
	}
}

does_jungle_pact_exist = {
	jungle_pact_exists = yes
}

jungle_pact_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = jungle_pact_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { jungle_pact_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_jungle_pact_not_exist = {
	jungle_pact_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_jungle_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_jungle_pact_tt
		any_country = {
			is_jungle_pact_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_jungle_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_jungle_pact_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_jungle_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_jungle_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_jungle_pact_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_jungle_pact_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_jungle_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_jungle_pact_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_jungle_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_jungle_pact_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_jungle_pact_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_jungle_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_jungle_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_jungle_pact_tt
		borders_jungle_pact = no
	}
}

can_join_jungle_pact = {
	can_join_jungle_pact_generic = yes
	can_join_jungle_pact_specific = yes
}

can_join_jungle_pact_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_jungle_pact = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_jungle_pact = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_jungle_pact }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.jungle_pact_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.jungle_pact_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_jungle_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_jungle_pact_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_jungle_pact_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# kaisers_legion
is_kaisers_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_kaisers_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.kaisers_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_kaisers_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_kaisers_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_kaisers_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_kaisers_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_kaisers_legion_leader_tt
		is_kaisers_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_kaisers_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_kaisers_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_kaisers_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

kaisers_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = kaisers_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.kaisers_legion_leader
	}
}

does_kaisers_legion_exist = {
	kaisers_legion_exists = yes
}

kaisers_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = kaisers_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { kaisers_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_kaisers_legion_not_exist = {
	kaisers_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_kaisers_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_kaisers_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_kaisers_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_kaisers_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_kaisers_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_kaisers_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_kaisers_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_kaisers_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_kaisers_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_kaisers_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_kaisers_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_kaisers_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_kaisers_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_kaisers_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_kaisers_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_kaisers_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_kaisers_legion_tt
		borders_kaisers_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_kaisers_legion = {
	can_join_kaisers_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_kaisers_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_kaisers_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_kaisers_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_kaisers_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_kaisers_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.kaisers_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.kaisers_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_kaisers_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_kaisers_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_kaisers_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# masters_new_army

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_masters_new_army_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.masters_new_army_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_masters_new_army_member_tt
		NOT = { is_masters_new_army_member = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_masters_new_army_leader_tt
		is_masters_new_army_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_masters_new_army_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_masters_new_army_leader = yes }
	}
}

masters_new_army_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = masters_new_army_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.masters_new_army_leader
	}
}

does_masters_new_army_exist = {
	masters_new_army_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = masters_new_army_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { masters_new_army_exists = yes }
	}
}

	masters_new_army_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_masters_new_army = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_masters_new_army_tt
		any_country = {
			is_masters_new_army_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_masters_new_army = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_masters_new_army_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_masters_new_army_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_masters_new_army = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_masters_new_army_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_masters_new_army_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_masters_new_army_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_masters_new_army_member = yes
		}
	}
}
