	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_masters_new_army_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_masters_new_army_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_masters_new_army = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_masters_new_army_tt
		borders_masters_new_army = no
	}
}

can_join_masters_new_army = {
	can_join_masters_new_army_generic = yes
	can_join_masters_new_army_specific = yes
}

can_join_masters_new_army_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_masters_new_army = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_masters_new_army = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_masters_new_army }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.masters_new_army_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.masters_new_army_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_masters_new_army = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_masters_new_army_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_masters_new_army_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# mesoamerican_alliance
is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mesoamerican_alliance_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.mesoamerican_alliance_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_mesoamerican_alliance_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mesoamerican_alliance_member_tt
		NOT = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes }
	}
}

is_mesoamerican_alliance_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mesoamerican_alliance_leader_tt
		is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_mesoamerican_alliance_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mesoamerican_alliance_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_leader = yes }
	}
}

mesoamerican_alliance_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mesoamerican_alliance_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.mesoamerican_alliance_leader
	}
}

does_mesoamerican_alliance_exist = {
	mesoamerican_alliance_exists = yes
}

mesoamerican_alliance_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mesoamerican_alliance_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { mesoamerican_alliance_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_mesoamerican_alliance_not_exist = {
	mesoamerican_alliance_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_mesoamerican_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_mesoamerican_alliance_tt
		any_country = {
			is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_mesoamerican_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_mesoamerican_alliance_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_mesoamerican_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_mesoamerican_alliance_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_mesoamerican_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mesoamerican_alliance_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_mesoamerican_alliance_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mesoamerican_alliance_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_mesoamerican_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_mesoamerican_alliance_tt
		borders_mesoamerican_alliance = no
	}
}

can_join_mesoamerican_alliance = {
	can_join_mesoamerican_alliance_generic = yes
	can_join_mesoamerican_alliance_specific = yes
}

can_join_mesoamerican_alliance_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_mesoamerican_alliance = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mesoamerican_alliance = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_mesoamerican_alliance }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mesoamerican_alliance_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mesoamerican_alliance_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mesoamerican_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mesoamerican_alliance_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_mesoamerican_alliance_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# the_fire_council
is_the_fire_council_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_the_fire_council_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.the_fire_council_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_the_fire_council_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_the_fire_council_member_tt
		NOT = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes }
	}
}

is_the_fire_council_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_the_fire_council_leader_tt
		is_the_fire_council_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_the_fire_council_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_the_fire_council_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_the_fire_council_leader = yes }
	}
}

the_fire_council_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = the_fire_council_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.the_fire_council_leader
	}
}

does_the_fire_council_exist = {
	the_fire_council_exists = yes
}

the_fire_council_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = the_fire_council_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { the_fire_council_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_the_fire_council_not_exist = {
	the_fire_council_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_the_fire_council = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_the_fire_council_tt
		any_country = {
			is_the_fire_council_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_the_fire_council = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_the_fire_council_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_the_fire_council_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_the_fire_council = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_the_fire_council_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_the_fire_council_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_the_fire_council = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_the_fire_council_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_the_fire_council_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_the_fire_council_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_the_fire_council_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_the_fire_council_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_the_fire_council = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_the_fire_council_tt
		borders_the_fire_council = no
	}
}

can_join_the_fire_council = {
	can_join_the_fire_council_generic = yes
	can_join_the_fire_council_specific = yes
}

can_join_the_fire_council_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_the_fire_council = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_the_fire_council = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_the_fire_council }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.the_fire_council_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.the_fire_council_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_the_fire_council = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_the_fire_council_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_the_fire_council_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mojave_alliance_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.mojave_alliance_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mojave_alliance_member_tt
		NOT = { is_mojave_alliance_member = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mojave_alliance_leader_tt
		is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mojave_alliance_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_mojave_alliance_leader = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mojave_alliance_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.mojave_alliance_leader
	}
}

	mojave_alliance_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mojave_alliance_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { mojave_alliance_exists = yes }
	}
}

	mojave_alliance_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_mojave_alliance_tt
		any_country = {
			is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_mojave_alliance_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_mojave_alliance_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mojave_alliance_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_mojave_alliance_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mojave_alliance_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mojave_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_mojave_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_mojave_alliance_tt
		borders_mojave_alliance = no
	}
}

can_join_mojave_alliance = {
	can_join_mojave_alliance_generic = yes
	can_join_mojave_alliance_specific = yes
}

can_join_mojave_alliance_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_mojave_alliance = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mojave_alliance = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_mojave_alliance }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mojave_alliance_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mojave_alliance_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mojave_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mojave_alliance_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_mojave_alliance_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# mormon_alliance
is_mormon_alliance_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mormon_alliance_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.mormon_alliance_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_mormon_alliance_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mormon_alliance_member_tt
		NOT = { is_mormon_alliance_member = yes }
	}
}

is_mormon_alliance_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mormon_alliance_leader_tt
		is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_mormon_alliance_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mormon_alliance_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_mormon_alliance_leader = yes }
	}
}

mormon_alliance_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mormon_alliance_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.mormon_alliance_leader
	}
}

does_mormon_alliance_exist = {
	mormon_alliance_exists = yes
}

mormon_alliance_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mormon_alliance_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { mormon_alliance_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_mormon_alliance_not_exist = {
	mormon_alliance_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_mormon_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_mormon_alliance_tt
		any_country = {
			is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_mormon_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_mormon_alliance_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_mormon_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_mormon_alliance_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_mormon_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mormon_alliance_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_mormon_alliance_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mormon_alliance_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mormon_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_mormon_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_mormon_alliance_tt
		borders_mormon_alliance = no
	}
}

can_join_mormon_alliance = {
	can_join_mormon_alliance_generic = yes
	can_join_mormon_alliance_specific = yes
}

can_join_mormon_alliance_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_mormon_alliance = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mormon_alliance = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_mormon_alliance }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mormon_alliance_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mormon_alliance_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mormon_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mormon_alliance_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_mormon_alliance_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# nevada_enclave
is_nevada_enclave_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_nevada_enclave_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.nevada_enclave_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_nevada_enclave_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_nevada_enclave_member_tt
		NOT = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes }
	}
}

is_nevada_enclave_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_nevada_enclave_leader_tt
		is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_nevada_enclave_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_nevada_enclave_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_nevada_enclave_leader = yes }
	}
}

nevada_enclave_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = nevada_enclave_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.nevada_enclave_leader
	}
}

	nevada_enclave_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = nevada_enclave_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { nevada_enclave_exists = yes }
	}
}

	nevada_enclave_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_nevada_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_nevada_enclave_tt
		any_country = {
			is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_nevada_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_nevada_enclave_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_nevada_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_nevada_enclave_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_nevada_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_nevada_enclave_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_nevada_enclave_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_nevada_enclave_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_nevada_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_nevada_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_nevada_enclave_tt
		borders_nevada_enclave = no
	}
}

can_join_nevada_enclave = {
	can_join_nevada_enclave_generic = yes
	can_join_nevada_enclave_specific = yes
}

can_join_nevada_enclave_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_nevada_enclave = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nevada_enclave = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_nevada_enclave }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.nevada_enclave_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.nevada_enclave_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nevada_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nevada_enclave_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_nevada_enclave_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

		NOT = { is_nevada_pact_member = yes }
	}

		is_nevada_pact_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}

		tooltip = is_not_nevada_pact_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_nevada_pact_leader = yes }
	}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = nevada_pact_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.nevada_pact_leader
	}

	}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_nevada_pact_tt
		any_country = {
			is_nevada_pact_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_nevada_pact_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_nevada_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_nevada_pact_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_nevada_pact_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_nevada_pact_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_nevada_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_nevada_pact_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_nevada_pact_member = yes
		}
	}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_nevada_pact_tt
		borders_nevada_pact = no
	}
}

can_join_nevada_pact = {
	can_join_nevada_pact_generic = yes
	can_join_nevada_pact_specific = yes
}

can_join_nevada_pact_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_nevada_pact = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nevada_pact = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_nevada_pact }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.nevada_pact_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.nevada_pact_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_nevada_pact_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_nevada_pact_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_league_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.northern_league_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_northern_league_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_league_member_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_league_member = yes }
	}
}

is_northern_league_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_league_leader_tt
		is_northern_league_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_northern_league_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_league_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_league_leader = yes }
	}
}

northern_league_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_league_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.northern_league_leader
	}
}

does_northern_league_exist = {
	northern_league_exists = yes
}

northern_league_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_league_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { northern_league_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_northern_league_not_exist = {
	northern_league_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_northern_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_northern_league_tt
		any_country = {
			is_northern_league_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_northern_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_northern_league_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_northern_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_northern_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_northern_league_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_northern_league_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_league_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_league_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_northern_league_tt
		borders_northern_league = no
	}
}

can_join_northern_league = {
	can_join_northern_league_generic = yes
	can_join_northern_league_specific = yes
}

can_join_northern_league_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_northern_league = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_league = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_northern_league }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_league_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_league_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_league_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_northern_league_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

		}
	}

				is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes

		}

		tooltip = does_not_border_northern_mojave_pact_tt
		borders_northern_mojave_pact = no
	}

can_join_northern_mojave_pact = {
	can_join_northern_mojave_pact_generic = yes
	can_join_northern_mojave_pact_specific = yes
}

can_join_northern_mojave_pact_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_northern_mojave_pact = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_mojave_pact = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_northern_mojave_pact }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_mojave_pact_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_mojave_pact_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_mojave_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_mojave_pact_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_northern_mojave_pact_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# phoenix_federation
is_phoenix_federation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_phoenix_federation_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.phoenix_federation_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_phoenix_federation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_phoenix_federation_member_tt
		NOT = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes }
	}
}

is_phoenix_federation_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_phoenix_federation_leader_tt
		is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_phoenix_federation_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_phoenix_federation_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_phoenix_federation_leader = yes }
	}
}

phoenix_federation_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = phoenix_federation_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.phoenix_federation_leader
	}
}

does_phoenix_federation_exist = {
	phoenix_federation_exists = yes
}

phoenix_federation_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = phoenix_federation_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { phoenix_federation_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_phoenix_federation_not_exist = {
	phoenix_federation_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_phoenix_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_phoenix_federation_tt
		any_country = {
			is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_phoenix_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_phoenix_federation_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_phoenix_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_phoenix_federation_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_phoenix_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_phoenix_federation_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_phoenix_federation_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_phoenix_federation_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_phoenix_federation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_phoenix_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_phoenix_federation_tt
		borders_phoenix_federation = no
	}
}

can_join_phoenix_federation = {
	can_join_phoenix_federation_generic = yes
	can_join_phoenix_federation_specific = yes
}

can_join_phoenix_federation_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_phoenix_federation = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_phoenix_federation = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_phoenix_federation }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.phoenix_federation_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.phoenix_federation_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_phoenix_federation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_phoenix_federation_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_phoenix_federation_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# rio_pact
is_rio_pact_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_rio_pact_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.rio_pact_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_rio_pact_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_rio_pact_member_tt
		NOT = { is_rio_pact_member = yes }
	}
}

is_rio_pact_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_rio_pact_leader_tt
		is_rio_pact_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_rio_pact_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_rio_pact_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_rio_pact_leader = yes }
	}
}

rio_pact_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = rio_pact_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.rio_pact_leader
	}
}

does_rio_pact_exist = {
	rio_pact_exists = yes
}

rio_pact_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = rio_pact_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { rio_pact_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_rio_pact_not_exist = {
	rio_pact_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_rio_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_rio_pact_tt
		any_country = {
			is_rio_pact_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_rio_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_rio_pact_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_rio_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_rio_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_rio_pact_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_rio_pact_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_rio_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_rio_pact_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_rio_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_rio_pact_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_rio_pact_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_rio_pact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_rio_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_rio_pact_tt
		borders_rio_pact = no
	}
}

can_join_rio_pact = {
	can_join_rio_pact_generic = yes
	can_join_rio_pact_specific = yes
}

can_join_rio_pact_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_rio_pact = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_rio_pact = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_rio_pact }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.rio_pact_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.rio_pact_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_rio_pact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_rio_pact_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_rio_pact_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_senators_little_helpers_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.senators_little_helpers_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_senators_little_helpers_member_tt
		NOT = { is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_senators_little_helpers_leader_tt
		is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_senators_little_helpers_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_senators_little_helpers_leader = yes }
	}
}

senators_little_helpers_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = senators_little_helpers_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.senators_little_helpers_leader
	}
}

	senators_little_helpers_exists = yes
}

senators_little_helpers_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = senators_little_helpers_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { senators_little_helpers_exists = yes }
	}
}

	senators_little_helpers_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_senators_little_helpers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_senators_little_helpers_tt
		any_country = {
			is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_senators_little_helpers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_senators_little_helpers_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_senators_little_helpers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_senators_little_helpers_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_senators_little_helpers_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_senators_little_helpers_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_senators_little_helpers_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_senators_little_helpers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_senators_little_helpers_tt
		borders_senators_little_helpers = no
	}
}

can_join_senators_little_helpers = {
	can_join_senators_little_helpers_generic = yes
	can_join_senators_little_helpers_specific = yes
}

can_join_senators_little_helpers_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_senators_little_helpers = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_senators_little_helpers = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_senators_little_helpers }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.senators_little_helpers_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.senators_little_helpers_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_senators_little_helpers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_senators_little_helpers_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_senators_little_helpers_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# great_confederation
is_great_confederation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_great_confederation_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.great_confederation_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_great_confederation_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_great_confederation_member_tt
		NOT = { is_great_confederation_member = yes }
	}
}

is_great_confederation_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_great_confederation_leader_tt
		is_great_confederation_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_great_confederation_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_great_confederation_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_great_confederation_leader = yes }
	}
}

great_confederation_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = great_confederation_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.great_confederation_leader
	}
}

does_great_confederation_exist = {
	great_confederation_exists = yes
}

great_confederation_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = great_confederation_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { great_confederation_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_great_confederation_not_exist = {
	great_confederation_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_great_confederation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_great_confederation_tt
		any_country = {
			is_great_confederation_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_great_confederation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_great_confederation_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_great_confederation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_great_confederation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_great_confederation_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_great_confederation_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_great_confederation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_great_confederation_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_great_confederation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_great_confederation_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_great_confederation_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_great_confederation_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_great_confederation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_great_confederation_tt
		borders_great_confederation = no
	}
}

can_join_great_confederation = {
	can_join_great_confederation_generic = yes
	can_join_great_confederation_specific = yes
}

can_join_great_confederation_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_great_confederation = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_confederation = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_great_confederation }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.great_confederation_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.great_confederation_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_confederation = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_great_confederation_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_great_confederation_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# texan_economic_union
is_texan_economic_union_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_texan_economic_union_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.texan_economic_union_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_texan_economic_union_member_tt
		NOT = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes }
	}
}

is_texan_economic_union_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_texan_economic_union_leader_tt
		is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_texan_economic_union_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_texan_economic_union_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_texan_economic_union_leader = yes }
	}
}

texan_economic_union_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = texan_economic_union_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.texan_economic_union_leader
	}
}

does_texan_economic_union_exist = {
	texan_economic_union_exists = yes
}

texan_economic_union_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = texan_economic_union_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { texan_economic_union_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_texan_economic_union_not_exist = {
	texan_economic_union_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_texan_economic_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_texan_economic_union_tt
		any_country = {
			is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_texan_economic_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_texan_economic_union_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_texan_economic_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_texan_economic_union_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_texan_economic_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_texan_economic_union_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_texan_economic_union_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_texan_economic_union_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_texan_economic_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_texan_economic_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_texan_economic_union_tt
		borders_texan_economic_union = no
	}
}

can_join_texan_economic_union = {
	can_join_texan_economic_union_generic = yes
	can_join_texan_economic_union_specific = yes
}

can_join_texan_economic_union_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_texan_economic_union = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_texan_economic_union = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_texan_economic_union }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.texan_economic_union_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.texan_economic_union_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_texan_economic_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_texan_economic_union_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_texan_economic_union_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# unbroken_coast
is_unbroken_coast_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_unbroken_coast_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.unbroken_coast_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_unbroken_coast_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_unbroken_coast_member_tt
		NOT = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes }
	}
}

is_unbroken_coast_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_unbroken_coast_leader_tt
		is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_unbroken_coast_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_unbroken_coast_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_unbroken_coast_leader = yes }
	}
}

unbroken_coast_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = unbroken_coast_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.unbroken_coast_leader
	}
}

does_unbroken_coast_exist = {
	unbroken_coast_exists = yes
}

unbroken_coast_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = unbroken_coast_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { unbroken_coast_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_unbroken_coast_not_exist = {
	unbroken_coast_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_unbroken_coast = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_unbroken_coast_tt
		any_country = {
			is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_unbroken_coast = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_unbroken_coast_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_unbroken_coast = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_unbroken_coast_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_unbroken_coast = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_unbroken_coast_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_unbroken_coast_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_unbroken_coast_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_unbroken_coast_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_unbroken_coast = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_unbroken_coast_tt
		borders_unbroken_coast = no
	}
}

can_join_unbroken_coast = {
	can_join_unbroken_coast_generic = yes
	can_join_unbroken_coast_specific = yes
}

can_join_unbroken_coast_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_unbroken_coast = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_unbroken_coast = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_unbroken_coast }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.unbroken_coast_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.unbroken_coast_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_unbroken_coast = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_unbroken_coast_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_unbroken_coast_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# western_enclave
is_western_enclave_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_western_enclave_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.western_enclave_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_western_enclave_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_western_enclave_member_tt
		NOT = { is_western_enclave_member = yes }
	}
}

is_western_enclave_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_western_enclave_leader_tt
		is_western_enclave_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_western_enclave_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_western_enclave_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_western_enclave_leader = yes }
	}
}

western_enclave_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = western_enclave_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.western_enclave_leader
	}
}

does_western_enclave_exist = {
	western_enclave_exists = yes
}

western_enclave_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = western_enclave_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { western_enclave_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_western_enclave_not_exist = {
	western_enclave_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_western_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_western_enclave_tt
		any_country = {
			is_western_enclave_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_western_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_western_enclave_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_western_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_western_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_western_enclave_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_western_enclave_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_western_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_western_enclave_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_western_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_western_enclave_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_western_enclave_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_western_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_western_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_western_enclave_tt
		borders_western_enclave = no
	}
}

can_join_western_enclave = {
	can_join_western_enclave_generic = yes
	can_join_western_enclave_specific = yes
}

can_join_western_enclave_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_western_enclave = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_western_enclave = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_western_enclave }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.western_enclave_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.western_enclave_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_western_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_western_enclave_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_western_enclave_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# order_of_st_joseph

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_order_of_st_joseph_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.order_of_st_joseph_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_order_of_st_joseph_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_order_of_st_joseph_member_tt
		NOT = { is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes }
	}
}

is_order_of_st_joseph_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_order_of_st_joseph_leader_tt
		is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_order_of_st_joseph_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_order_of_st_joseph_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_order_of_st_joseph_leader = yes }
	}
}

order_of_st_joseph_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = order_of_st_joseph_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.order_of_st_joseph_leader
	}
}

does_order_of_st_joseph_exist = {
	order_of_st_joseph_exists = yes
}

order_of_st_joseph_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = order_of_st_joseph_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { order_of_st_joseph_exists = yes }
	}
}

	order_of_st_joseph_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_order_of_st_joseph = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_order_of_st_joseph_tt
		any_country = {
			is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_order_of_st_joseph = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_order_of_st_joseph_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_order_of_st_joseph = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_order_of_st_joseph_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_order_of_st_joseph_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_order_of_st_joseph_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_order_of_st_joseph_tt
		borders_order_of_st_joseph = no
	}
}

can_join_order_of_st_joseph = {
	can_join_order_of_st_joseph_generic = yes
	can_join_order_of_st_joseph_specific = yes
}

can_join_order_of_st_joseph_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_order_of_st_joseph = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_order_of_st_joseph = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_order_of_st_joseph }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.order_of_st_joseph_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.order_of_st_joseph_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_order_of_st_joseph = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_order_of_st_joseph_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_order_of_st_joseph_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

is_breach_ferals_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_breach_ferals_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.breach_ferals_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_breach_ferals_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_breach_ferals_member_tt
		NOT = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes }
	}
}

is_breach_ferals_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_breach_ferals_leader_tt
		is_breach_ferals_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_breach_ferals_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_breach_ferals_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_breach_ferals_leader = yes }
	}
}

breach_ferals_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = breach_ferals_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.breach_ferals_leader
	}
}

does_breach_ferals_exist = {
	breach_ferals_exists = yes
}

breach_ferals_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = breach_ferals_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { breach_ferals_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_breach_ferals_not_exist = {
	breach_ferals_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_breach_ferals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_breach_ferals_tt
		any_country = {
			is_breach_ferals_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_breach_ferals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_breach_ferals_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_breach_ferals_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_breach_ferals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_breach_ferals_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_breach_ferals_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_breach_ferals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_breach_ferals_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_breach_ferals_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_breach_ferals_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_breach_ferals_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_breach_ferals_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_breach_ferals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_breach_ferals_tt
		borders_breach_ferals = no
	}
}

can_join_breach_ferals = {
	can_join_breach_ferals_generic = yes
	can_join_breach_ferals_specific = yes
}

can_join_breach_ferals_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_breach_ferals = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_breach_ferals = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_breach_ferals }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.breach_ferals_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.breach_ferals_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_breach_ferals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_breach_ferals_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_breach_ferals_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_white_sands_compact_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.white_sands_compact_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_white_sands_compact_member_tt
		NOT = { is_white_sands_compact_member = yes }
	}
}

is_white_sands_compact_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_white_sands_compact_leader_tt
		is_white_sands_compact_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_white_sands_compact_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_white_sands_compact_leader = yes }
	}
}

white_sands_compact_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = white_sands_compact_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.white_sands_compact_leader
	}
}

does_white_sands_compact_exist = {
	white_sands_compact_exists = yes
}

white_sands_compact_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = white_sands_compact_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { white_sands_compact_exists = yes }
	}
}

	white_sands_compact_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_white_sands_compact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_white_sands_compact_tt
		any_country = {
			is_white_sands_compact_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_white_sands_compact_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_white_sands_compact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_white_sands_compact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_white_sands_compact_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_white_sands_compact_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_white_sands_compact_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_white_sands_compact_member = yes
		}
	}
}
