	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_white_sands_compact_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_white_sands_compact_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_white_sands_compact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_white_sands_compact_tt
		borders_white_sands_compact = no
	}
}

can_join_white_sands_compact = {
	can_join_white_sands_compact_generic = yes
	can_join_white_sands_compact_specific = yes
}

can_join_white_sands_compact_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_white_sands_compact = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_white_sands_compact = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_white_sands_compact }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.white_sands_compact_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.white_sands_compact_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_white_sands_compact = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_white_sands_compact_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_white_sands_compact_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# cartel_faction
is_cartel_faction_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_cartel_faction_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.cartel_faction_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_cartel_faction_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_cartel_faction_member_tt
		NOT = { is_cartel_faction_member = yes }
	}
}

is_cartel_faction_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_cartel_faction_leader_tt
		is_cartel_faction_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_cartel_faction_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_cartel_faction_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_cartel_faction_leader = yes }
	}
}

cartel_faction_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = cartel_faction_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.cartel_faction_leader
	}
}

does_cartel_faction_exist = {
	cartel_faction_exists = yes
}

cartel_faction_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = cartel_faction_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { cartel_faction_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_cartel_faction_not_exist = {
	cartel_faction_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_cartel_faction = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_cartel_faction_tt
		any_country = {
			is_cartel_faction_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_cartel_faction = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_cartel_faction_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_cartel_faction_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_cartel_faction = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_cartel_faction_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_cartel_faction_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_cartel_faction = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_cartel_faction_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_cartel_faction_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_cartel_faction_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_cartel_faction_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_cartel_faction_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_cartel_faction = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_cartel_faction_tt
		borders_cartel_faction = no
	}
}

can_join_cartel_faction = {
	can_join_cartel_faction_generic = yes
	can_join_cartel_faction_specific = yes
}

can_join_cartel_faction_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_cartel_faction = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_cartel_faction = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_cartel_faction }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.cartel_faction_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.cartel_faction_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_cartel_faction = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_cartel_faction_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_cartel_faction_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# cascadia_pirates
is_cascadia_pirates_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_cascadia_pirates_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.cascadia_pirates_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_cascadia_pirates_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_cascadia_pirates_member_tt
		NOT = { is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes }
	}
}

is_cascadia_pirates_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_cascadia_pirates_leader_tt
		is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_cascadia_pirates_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_cascadia_pirates_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_cascadia_pirates_leader = yes }
	}
}

cascadia_pirates_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = cascadia_pirates_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.cascadia_pirates_leader
	}
}

does_cascadia_pirates_exist = {
	cascadia_pirates_exists = yes
}

cascadia_pirates_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = cascadia_pirates_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { cascadia_pirates_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_cascadia_pirates_not_exist = {
	cascadia_pirates_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_cascadia_pirates = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_cascadia_pirates_tt
		any_country = {
			is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_cascadia_pirates = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_cascadia_pirates_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_cascadia_pirates = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_cascadia_pirates_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_cascadia_pirates = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_cascadia_pirates_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_cascadia_pirates_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_cascadia_pirates_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_cascadia_pirates = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_cascadia_pirates_tt
		borders_cascadia_pirates = no
	}
}

can_join_cascadia_pirates = {
	can_join_cascadia_pirates_generic = yes
	can_join_cascadia_pirates_specific = yes
}

can_join_cascadia_pirates_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_cascadia_pirates = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_cascadia_pirates = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_cascadia_pirates }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.cascadia_pirates_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.cascadia_pirates_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_cascadia_pirates = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_cascadia_pirates_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_cascadia_pirates_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# transcascadia_republic
is_transcascadia_republic_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_transcascadia_republic_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.transcascadia_republic_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_transcascadia_republic_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_transcascadia_republic_member_tt
		NOT = { is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes }
	}
}

is_transcascadia_republic_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_transcascadia_republic_leader_tt
		is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_transcascadia_republic_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_transcascadia_republic_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_transcascadia_republic_leader = yes }
	}
}

transcascadia_republic_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = transcascadia_republic_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.transcascadia_republic_leader
	}
}

does_transcascadia_republic_exist = {
	transcascadia_republic_exists = yes
}

transcascadia_republic_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = transcascadia_republic_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { transcascadia_republic_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_transcascadia_republic_not_exist = {
	transcascadia_republic_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_transcascadia_republic = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_transcascadia_republic_tt
		any_country = {
			is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_transcascadia_republic = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_transcascadia_republic_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_transcascadia_republic = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_transcascadia_republic_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_transcascadia_republic = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_transcascadia_republic_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_transcascadia_republic_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_transcascadia_republic_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_transcascadia_republic = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_transcascadia_republic_tt
		borders_transcascadia_republic = no
	}
}

can_join_transcascadia_republic = {
	can_join_transcascadia_republic_generic = yes
	can_join_transcascadia_republic_specific = yes
}

can_join_transcascadia_republic_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_transcascadia_republic = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_transcascadia_republic = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_transcascadia_republic }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.transcascadia_republic_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.transcascadia_republic_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_transcascadia_republic = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_transcascadia_republic_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_transcascadia_republic_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# new_california
is_new_california_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_new_california_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.new_california_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_new_california_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_new_california_member_tt
		NOT = { is_new_california_member = yes }
	}
}

is_new_california_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_new_california_leader_tt
		is_new_california_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_new_california_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_new_california_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_new_california_leader = yes }
	}
}

new_california_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = new_california_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.new_california_leader
	}
}

does_new_california_exist = {
	new_california_exists = yes
}

new_california_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = new_california_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { new_california_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_new_california_not_exist = {
	new_california_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_new_california = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_new_california_tt
		any_country = {
			is_new_california_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_new_california = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_new_california_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_new_california_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_new_california = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_new_california_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_new_california_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_new_california = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_new_california_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_new_california_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_new_california_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_new_california_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_new_california_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_new_california = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_new_california_tt
		borders_new_california = no
	}
}

can_join_new_california = {
	can_join_new_california_generic = yes
	can_join_new_california_specific = yes
}

can_join_new_california_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_new_california = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_new_california = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_new_california }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.new_california_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.new_california_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_new_california = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_new_california_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_new_california_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# the_second_coalition
is_the_second_coalition_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_the_second_coalition_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.the_second_coalition_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_the_second_coalition_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_the_second_coalition_member_tt
		NOT = { is_the_second_coalition_member = yes }
	}
}

is_the_second_coalition_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_the_second_coalition_leader_tt
		is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_the_second_coalition_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_the_second_coalition_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_the_second_coalition_leader = yes }
	}
}

the_second_coalition_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = the_second_coalition_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.the_second_coalition_leader
	}
}

does_the_second_coalition_exist = {
	the_second_coalition_exists = yes
}

the_second_coalition_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = the_second_coalition_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { the_second_coalition_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_the_second_coalition_not_exist = {
	the_second_coalition_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_the_second_coalition = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_the_second_coalition_tt
		any_country = {
			is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_the_second_coalition = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_the_second_coalition_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_the_second_coalition = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_the_second_coalition_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_the_second_coalition = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_the_second_coalition_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_the_second_coalition_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_the_second_coalition_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_the_second_coalition_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_the_second_coalition = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_the_second_coalition_tt
		borders_the_second_coalition = no
	}
}

can_join_the_second_coalition = {
	can_join_the_second_coalition_generic = yes
	can_join_the_second_coalition_specific = yes
}

can_join_the_second_coalition_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_the_second_coalition = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_the_second_coalition = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_the_second_coalition }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.the_second_coalition_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.the_second_coalition_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_the_second_coalition = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_the_second_coalition_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_the_second_coalition_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# imperium_mexicanum
is_imperium_mexicanum_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_imperium_mexicanum_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.imperium_mexicanum_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_imperium_mexicanum_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_imperium_mexicanum_member_tt
		NOT = { is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes }
	}
}

is_imperium_mexicanum_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_imperium_mexicanum_leader_tt
		is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_imperium_mexicanum_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_imperium_mexicanum_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_imperium_mexicanum_leader = yes }
	}
}

imperium_mexicanum_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = imperium_mexicanum_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.imperium_mexicanum_leader
	}
}

does_imperium_mexicanum_exist = {
	imperium_mexicanum_exists = yes
}

imperium_mexicanum_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = imperium_mexicanum_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { imperium_mexicanum_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_imperium_mexicanum_not_exist = {
	imperium_mexicanum_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_imperium_mexicanum = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_imperium_mexicanum_tt
		any_country = {
			is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_imperium_mexicanum = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_imperium_mexicanum_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_imperium_mexicanum = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_imperium_mexicanum_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_imperium_mexicanum = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_imperium_mexicanum_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_imperium_mexicanum_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_imperium_mexicanum_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_imperium_mexicanum = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_imperium_mexicanum_tt
		borders_imperium_mexicanum = no
	}
}

can_join_imperium_mexicanum = {
	can_join_imperium_mexicanum_generic = yes
	can_join_imperium_mexicanum_specific = yes
}

can_join_imperium_mexicanum_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_imperium_mexicanum = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_imperium_mexicanum = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_imperium_mexicanum }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.imperium_mexicanum_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.imperium_mexicanum_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_imperium_mexicanum = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_imperium_mexicanum_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_imperium_mexicanum_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# mexican_league
is_mexican_league_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mexican_league_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.mexican_league_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_mexican_league_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mexican_league_member_tt
		NOT = { is_mexican_league_member = yes }
	}
}

is_mexican_league_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_mexican_league_leader_tt
		is_mexican_league_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_mexican_league_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_mexican_league_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_mexican_league_leader = yes }
	}
}

mexican_league_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mexican_league_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.mexican_league_leader
	}
}

does_mexican_league_exist = {
	mexican_league_exists = yes
}

mexican_league_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = mexican_league_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { mexican_league_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_mexican_league_not_exist = {
	mexican_league_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_mexican_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_mexican_league_tt
		any_country = {
			is_mexican_league_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_mexican_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_mexican_league_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_mexican_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_mexican_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_mexican_league_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_mexican_league_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_mexican_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mexican_league_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mexican_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_mexican_league_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_mexican_league_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_mexican_league_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_mexican_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_mexican_league_tt
		borders_mexican_league = no
	}
}

can_join_mexican_league = {
	can_join_mexican_league_generic = yes
	can_join_mexican_league_specific = yes
}

can_join_mexican_league_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_mexican_league = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mexican_league = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_mexican_league }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mexican_league_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.mexican_league_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mexican_league = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_mexican_league_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_mexican_league_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_midnight_union_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.midnight_union_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_midnight_union_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_midnight_union_member_tt
		NOT = { is_midnight_union_member = yes }
	}
}

is_midnight_union_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_midnight_union_leader_tt
		is_midnight_union_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_midnight_union_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_midnight_union_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_midnight_union_leader = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = midnight_union_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.midnight_union_leader
	}
}

does_midnight_union_exist = {
	midnight_union_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = midnight_union_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { midnight_union_exists = yes }
	}
}

	midnight_union_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_midnight_union_tt
		any_country = {
			is_midnight_union_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_midnight_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_midnight_union_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_midnight_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_midnight_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_midnight_union_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_midnight_union_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_midnight_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_midnight_union_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_midnight_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_midnight_union_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_midnight_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_midnight_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_midnight_union_tt
		borders_midnight_union = no
	}
}

can_join_midnight_union = {
	can_join_midnight_union_generic = yes
	can_join_midnight_union_specific = yes
}

can_join_midnight_union_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_midnight_union = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_midnight_union = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_midnight_union }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.midnight_union_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.midnight_union_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_midnight_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_midnight_union_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_midnight_union_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

is_big_circle_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_big_circle_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.big_circle_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_big_circle_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_big_circle_member_tt
		NOT = { is_big_circle_member = yes }
	}
}

is_big_circle_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_big_circle_leader_tt
		is_big_circle_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_big_circle_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_big_circle_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_big_circle_leader = yes }
	}
}

big_circle_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = big_circle_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.big_circle_leader
	}
}

	big_circle_exists = yes
}

big_circle_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = big_circle_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { big_circle_exists = yes }
	}
}

	big_circle_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_big_circle_tt
		any_country = {
			is_big_circle_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_big_circle = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_big_circle_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_big_circle_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_big_circle = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_big_circle_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_big_circle_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_big_circle = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_big_circle_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_big_circle_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_big_circle_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_big_circle_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_big_circle_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_big_circle = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_big_circle_tt
		borders_big_circle = no
	}
}

can_join_big_circle = {
	can_join_big_circle_generic = yes
	can_join_big_circle_specific = yes
}

can_join_big_circle_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_big_circle = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_big_circle = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_big_circle }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.big_circle_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.big_circle_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_big_circle_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_big_circle_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# dharma_way
is_dharma_way_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_dharma_way_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.dharma_way_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_dharma_way_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_dharma_way_member_tt
		NOT = { is_dharma_way_member = yes }
	}
}

is_dharma_way_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_dharma_way_leader_tt
		is_dharma_way_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_dharma_way_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_dharma_way_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_dharma_way_leader = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = dharma_way_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.dharma_way_leader
	}
}

	dharma_way_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = dharma_way_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { dharma_way_exists = yes }
	}
}

	dharma_way_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_dharma_way_tt
		any_country = {
			is_dharma_way_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_dharma_way_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_dharma_way_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_dharma_way_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_dharma_way_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_dharma_way_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_dharma_way_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_dharma_way_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_dharma_way_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_dharma_way_tt
		borders_dharma_way = no
	}
}

can_join_dharma_way = {
	can_join_dharma_way_generic = yes
	can_join_dharma_way_specific = yes
}

can_join_dharma_way_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_dharma_way = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_dharma_way = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_dharma_way }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.dharma_way_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.dharma_way_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_dharma_way_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_dharma_way_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_californian_hegemony_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.californian_hegemony_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_californian_hegemony_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_californian_hegemony_member_tt
		NOT = { is_californian_hegemony_member = yes }
	}
}

is_californian_hegemony_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_californian_hegemony_leader_tt
		is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_californian_hegemony_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_californian_hegemony_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_californian_hegemony_leader = yes }
	}
}

californian_hegemony_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = californian_hegemony_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.californian_hegemony_leader
	}
}

	californian_hegemony_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = californian_hegemony_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { californian_hegemony_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_californian_hegemony_not_exist = {
	californian_hegemony_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_californian_hegemony = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_californian_hegemony_tt
		any_country = {
			is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_californian_hegemony = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_californian_hegemony_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_californian_hegemony = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_californian_hegemony_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_californian_hegemony_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_californian_hegemony_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_californian_hegemony_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_californian_hegemony_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_californian_hegemony = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_californian_hegemony_tt
		borders_californian_hegemony = no
	}
}

can_join_californian_hegemony = {
	can_join_californian_hegemony_generic = yes
	can_join_californian_hegemony_specific = yes
}

can_join_californian_hegemony_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_californian_hegemony = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_californian_hegemony = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_californian_hegemony }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.californian_hegemony_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.californian_hegemony_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_californian_hegemony = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_californian_hegemony_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_californian_hegemony_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# northern_congress
is_northern_congress_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_congress_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.northern_congress_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_northern_congress_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_congress_member_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_congress_member = yes }
	}
}

is_northern_congress_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_congress_leader_tt
		is_northern_congress_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_northern_congress_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_congress_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_congress_leader = yes }
	}
}

northern_congress_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_congress_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.northern_congress_leader
	}
}

does_northern_congress_exist = {
	northern_congress_exists = yes
}

northern_congress_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_congress_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { northern_congress_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_northern_congress_not_exist = {
	northern_congress_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_northern_congress = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_northern_congress_tt
		any_country = {
			is_northern_congress_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_northern_congress = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_northern_congress_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_northern_congress_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_northern_congress = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_northern_congress_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_northern_congress_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_northern_congress = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_congress_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_congress_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_northern_congress_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_congress_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_congress_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_northern_congress = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_northern_congress_tt
		borders_northern_congress = no
	}
}

can_join_northern_congress = {
	can_join_northern_congress_generic = yes
	can_join_northern_congress_specific = yes
}

can_join_northern_congress_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_northern_congress = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_congress = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_northern_congress }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_congress_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_congress_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_congress = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_congress_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_northern_congress_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# road_warriors
is_road_warriors_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_road_warriors_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.road_warriors_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_road_warriors_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_road_warriors_member_tt
		NOT = { is_road_warriors_member = yes }
	}
}

is_road_warriors_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_road_warriors_leader_tt
		is_road_warriors_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_road_warriors_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_road_warriors_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_road_warriors_leader = yes }
	}
}

road_warriors_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = road_warriors_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.road_warriors_leader
	}
}

does_road_warriors_exist = {
	road_warriors_exists = yes
}

road_warriors_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = road_warriors_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { road_warriors_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_road_warriors_not_exist = {
	road_warriors_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_road_warriors = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_road_warriors_tt
		any_country = {
			is_road_warriors_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_road_warriors = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_road_warriors_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_road_warriors_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_road_warriors = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_road_warriors_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_road_warriors_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_road_warriors = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_road_warriors_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_road_warriors_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_road_warriors_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_road_warriors_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_road_warriors_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_road_warriors = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_road_warriors_tt
		borders_road_warriors = no
	}
}

can_join_road_warriors = {
	can_join_road_warriors_generic = yes
	can_join_road_warriors_specific = yes
}

can_join_road_warriors_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_road_warriors = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_road_warriors = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_road_warriors }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.road_warriors_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.road_warriors_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_road_warriors = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_road_warriors_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_road_warriors_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_synergy_alliance_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.synergy_alliance_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_synergy_alliance_member_tt
		NOT = { is_synergy_alliance_member = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_synergy_alliance_leader_tt
		is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_synergy_alliance_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_synergy_alliance_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_synergy_alliance_leader = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = synergy_alliance_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.synergy_alliance_leader
	}
}

does_synergy_alliance_exist = {
	synergy_alliance_exists = yes
}

synergy_alliance_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = synergy_alliance_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { synergy_alliance_exists = yes }
	}
}

	synergy_alliance_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_synergy_alliance_tt
		any_country = {
			is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_synergy_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_synergy_alliance_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_synergy_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_synergy_alliance_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_synergy_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_synergy_alliance_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}
