	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_synergy_alliance_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_synergy_alliance_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_synergy_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_synergy_alliance_tt
		borders_synergy_alliance = no
	}
}

can_join_synergy_alliance = {
	can_join_synergy_alliance_generic = yes
	can_join_synergy_alliance_specific = yes
}

can_join_synergy_alliance_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_synergy_alliance = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_synergy_alliance = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_synergy_alliance }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.synergy_alliance_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.synergy_alliance_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_synergy_alliance = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_synergy_alliance_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_synergy_alliance_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# vulpes_legion
is_vulpes_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_vulpes_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.vulpes_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_vulpes_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_vulpes_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_vulpes_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_vulpes_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_vulpes_legion_leader_tt
		is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_vulpes_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_vulpes_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_vulpes_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

vulpes_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = vulpes_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.vulpes_legion_leader
	}
}

does_vulpes_legion_exist = {
	vulpes_legion_exists = yes
}

vulpes_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = vulpes_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { vulpes_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_vulpes_legion_not_exist = {
	vulpes_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_vulpes_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_vulpes_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_vulpes_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_vulpes_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_vulpes_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_vulpes_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_vulpes_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_vulpes_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_vulpes_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_vulpes_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_vulpes_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_vulpes_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_vulpes_legion_tt
		borders_vulpes_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_vulpes_legion = {
	can_join_vulpes_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_vulpes_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_vulpes_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_vulpes_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_vulpes_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_vulpes_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.vulpes_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.vulpes_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_vulpes_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_vulpes_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_vulpes_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# aurelius_legion
is_aurelius_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_aurelius_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.aurelius_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_aurelius_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_aurelius_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_aurelius_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_aurelius_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_aurelius_legion_leader_tt
		is_aurelius_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_aurelius_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_aurelius_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_aurelius_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

aurelius_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = aurelius_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.aurelius_legion_leader
	}
}

does_aurelius_legion_exist = {
	aurelius_legion_exists = yes
}

aurelius_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = aurelius_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { aurelius_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_aurelius_legion_not_exist = {
	aurelius_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_aurelius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_aurelius_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_aurelius_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_aurelius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_aurelius_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_aurelius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_aurelius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_aurelius_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_aurelius_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_aurelius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_aurelius_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_aurelius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_aurelius_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_aurelius_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_aurelius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_aurelius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_aurelius_legion_tt
		borders_aurelius_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_aurelius_legion = {
	can_join_aurelius_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_aurelius_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_aurelius_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_aurelius_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_aurelius_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_aurelius_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.aurelius_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.aurelius_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_aurelius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_aurelius_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_aurelius_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# lanius_legion
is_lanius_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_lanius_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.lanius_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_lanius_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_lanius_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_lanius_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_lanius_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_lanius_legion_leader_tt
		is_lanius_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_lanius_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_lanius_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_lanius_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

lanius_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = lanius_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.lanius_legion_leader
	}
}

does_lanius_legion_exist = {
	lanius_legion_exists = yes
}

lanius_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = lanius_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { lanius_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_lanius_legion_not_exist = {
	lanius_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_lanius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_lanius_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_lanius_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_lanius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_lanius_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_lanius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_lanius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_lanius_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_lanius_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_lanius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_lanius_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_lanius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_lanius_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_lanius_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_lanius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_lanius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_lanius_legion_tt
		borders_lanius_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_lanius_legion = {
	can_join_lanius_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_lanius_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_lanius_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_lanius_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lanius_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_lanius_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.lanius_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.lanius_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lanius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lanius_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_lanius_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# hades_legion
is_hades_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_hades_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.hades_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_hades_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_hades_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_hades_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_hades_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_hades_legion_leader_tt
		is_hades_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_hades_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_hades_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_hades_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

hades_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = hades_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.hades_legion_leader
	}
}

does_hades_legion_exist = {
	hades_legion_exists = yes
}

hades_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = hades_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { hades_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_hades_legion_not_exist = {
	hades_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_hades_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_hades_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_hades_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_hades_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_hades_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_hades_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_hades_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_hades_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_hades_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_hades_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_hades_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_hades_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_hades_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_hades_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_hades_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_hades_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_hades_legion_tt
		borders_hades_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_hades_legion = {
	can_join_hades_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_hades_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_hades_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_hades_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_hades_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_hades_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.hades_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.hades_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_hades_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_hades_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_hades_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# lucius_legion
is_lucius_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_lucius_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.lucius_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_lucius_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_lucius_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_lucius_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_lucius_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_lucius_legion_leader_tt
		is_lucius_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_lucius_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_lucius_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_lucius_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

lucius_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = lucius_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.lucius_legion_leader
	}
}

does_lucius_legion_exist = {
	lucius_legion_exists = yes
}

lucius_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = lucius_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { lucius_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_lucius_legion_not_exist = {
	lucius_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_lucius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_lucius_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_lucius_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_lucius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_lucius_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_lucius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_lucius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_lucius_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_lucius_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_lucius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_lucius_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_lucius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_lucius_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_lucius_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_lucius_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_lucius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_lucius_legion_tt
		borders_lucius_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_lucius_legion = {
	can_join_lucius_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_lucius_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_lucius_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_lucius_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lucius_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_lucius_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.lucius_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.lucius_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lucius_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_lucius_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_lucius_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# malpais_legion
is_malpais_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_malpais_legion_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.malpais_legion_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_malpais_legion_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_malpais_legion_member_tt
		NOT = { is_malpais_legion_member = yes }
	}
}

is_malpais_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_malpais_legion_leader_tt
		is_malpais_legion_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_malpais_legion_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_malpais_legion_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_malpais_legion_leader = yes }
	}
}

malpais_legion_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = malpais_legion_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.malpais_legion_leader
	}
}

does_malpais_legion_exist = {
	malpais_legion_exists = yes
}

malpais_legion_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = malpais_legion_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { malpais_legion_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_malpais_legion_not_exist = {
	malpais_legion_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_malpais_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_malpais_legion_tt
		any_country = {
			is_malpais_legion_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_malpais_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_malpais_legion_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_malpais_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_malpais_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_malpais_legion_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_malpais_legion_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_malpais_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_malpais_legion_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_malpais_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_malpais_legion_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_malpais_legion_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_malpais_legion_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_malpais_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_malpais_legion_tt
		borders_malpais_legion = no
	}
}

can_join_malpais_legion = {
	can_join_malpais_legion_generic = yes
	can_join_malpais_legion_specific = yes
}

can_join_malpais_legion_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_malpais_legion = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_malpais_legion = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_malpais_legion }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.malpais_legion_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.malpais_legion_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_malpais_legion = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_malpais_legion_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_malpais_legion_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# northern_union
is_northern_union_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_union_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.northern_union_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_northern_union_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_union_member_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_union_member = yes }
	}
}

is_northern_union_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_union_leader_tt
		is_northern_union_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_northern_union_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_union_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_union_leader = yes }
	}
}

northern_union_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_union_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.northern_union_leader
	}
}

does_northern_union_exist = {
	northern_union_exists = yes
}

northern_union_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_union_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { northern_union_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_northern_union_not_exist = {
	northern_union_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_northern_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_northern_union_tt
		any_country = {
			is_northern_union_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_northern_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_northern_union_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_northern_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_northern_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_northern_union_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_northern_union_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_northern_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_union_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_northern_union_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_union_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_union_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_northern_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_northern_union_tt
		borders_northern_union = no
	}
}

can_join_northern_union = {
	can_join_northern_union_generic = yes
	can_join_northern_union_specific = yes
}

can_join_northern_union_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_northern_union = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_union = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_northern_union }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_union_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_union_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_union = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_union_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_northern_union_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# bloody_electorals
is_bloody_electorals_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_bloody_electorals_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.bloody_electorals_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_bloody_electorals_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_bloody_electorals_member_tt
		NOT = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes }
	}
}

is_bloody_electorals_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_bloody_electorals_leader_tt
		is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_bloody_electorals_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_bloody_electorals_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_bloody_electorals_leader = yes }
	}
}

bloody_electorals_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = bloody_electorals_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.bloody_electorals_leader
	}
}

does_bloody_electorals_exist = {
	bloody_electorals_exists = yes
}

bloody_electorals_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = bloody_electorals_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { bloody_electorals_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_bloody_electorals_not_exist = {
	bloody_electorals_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_bloody_electorals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_bloody_electorals_tt
		any_country = {
			is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_bloody_electorals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_bloody_electorals_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_bloody_electorals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_bloody_electorals_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_bloody_electorals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_bloody_electorals_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_bloody_electorals_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_bloody_electorals_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_bloody_electorals_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_bloody_electorals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_bloody_electorals_tt
		borders_bloody_electorals = no
	}
}

can_join_bloody_electorals = {
	can_join_bloody_electorals_generic = yes
	can_join_bloody_electorals_specific = yes
}

can_join_bloody_electorals_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_bloody_electorals = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_bloody_electorals = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_bloody_electorals }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.bloody_electorals_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.bloody_electorals_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_bloody_electorals = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_bloody_electorals_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_bloody_electorals_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# canadian_watchdogs
is_canadian_watchdogs_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_canadian_watchdogs_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.canadian_watchdogs_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_canadian_watchdogs_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_canadian_watchdogs_member_tt
		NOT = { is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes }
	}
}

is_canadian_watchdogs_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_canadian_watchdogs_leader_tt
		is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_canadian_watchdogs_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_canadian_watchdogs_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_canadian_watchdogs_leader = yes }
	}
}

canadian_watchdogs_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = canadian_watchdogs_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.canadian_watchdogs_leader
	}
}

does_canadian_watchdogs_exist = {
	canadian_watchdogs_exists = yes
}

canadian_watchdogs_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = canadian_watchdogs_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { canadian_watchdogs_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_canadian_watchdogs_not_exist = {
	canadian_watchdogs_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_canadian_watchdogs = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_canadian_watchdogs_tt
		any_country = {
			is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_canadian_watchdogs = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_canadian_watchdogs_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_canadian_watchdogs = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_canadian_watchdogs_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_canadian_watchdogs = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_canadian_watchdogs_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_canadian_watchdogs_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_canadian_watchdogs_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_canadian_watchdogs = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_canadian_watchdogs_tt
		borders_canadian_watchdogs = no
	}
}

can_join_canadian_watchdogs = {
	can_join_canadian_watchdogs_generic = yes
	can_join_canadian_watchdogs_specific = yes
}

can_join_canadian_watchdogs_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_canadian_watchdogs = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_canadian_watchdogs = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_canadian_watchdogs }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.canadian_watchdogs_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.canadian_watchdogs_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_canadian_watchdogs = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_canadian_watchdogs_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_canadian_watchdogs_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# kingdom_of_manitoba
is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.kingdom_of_manitoba_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_kingdom_of_manitoba_member_tt
		NOT = { is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes }
	}
}

is_kingdom_of_manitoba_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_kingdom_of_manitoba_leader_tt
		is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_kingdom_of_manitoba_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_kingdom_of_manitoba_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_kingdom_of_manitoba_leader = yes }
	}
}

kingdom_of_manitoba_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = kingdom_of_manitoba_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.kingdom_of_manitoba_leader
	}
}

does_kingdom_of_manitoba_exist = {
	kingdom_of_manitoba_exists = yes
}

kingdom_of_manitoba_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = kingdom_of_manitoba_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { kingdom_of_manitoba_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_kingdom_of_manitoba_not_exist = {
	kingdom_of_manitoba_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_kingdom_of_manitoba = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_kingdom_of_manitoba_tt
		any_country = {
			is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_kingdom_of_manitoba = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_kingdom_of_manitoba_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_kingdom_of_manitoba = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_kingdom_of_manitoba_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_kingdom_of_manitoba = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_kingdom_of_manitoba_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_kingdom_of_manitoba_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_kingdom_of_manitoba_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_kingdom_of_manitoba = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_kingdom_of_manitoba_tt
		borders_kingdom_of_manitoba = no
	}
}

can_join_kingdom_of_manitoba = {
	can_join_kingdom_of_manitoba_generic = yes
	can_join_kingdom_of_manitoba_specific = yes
}

can_join_kingdom_of_manitoba_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_kingdom_of_manitoba = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_kingdom_of_manitoba = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_kingdom_of_manitoba }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.kingdom_of_manitoba_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.kingdom_of_manitoba_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_kingdom_of_manitoba = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_kingdom_of_manitoba_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_kingdom_of_manitoba_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# united_wallers
is_united_wallers_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_united_wallers_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.united_wallers_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_united_wallers_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_united_wallers_member_tt
		NOT = { is_united_wallers_member = yes }
	}
}

is_united_wallers_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_united_wallers_leader_tt
		is_united_wallers_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_united_wallers_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_united_wallers_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_united_wallers_leader = yes }
	}
}

united_wallers_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = united_wallers_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.united_wallers_leader
	}
}

does_united_wallers_exist = {
	united_wallers_exists = yes
}

united_wallers_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = united_wallers_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { united_wallers_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_united_wallers_not_exist = {
	united_wallers_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_united_wallers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_united_wallers_tt
		any_country = {
			is_united_wallers_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_united_wallers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_united_wallers_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_united_wallers_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_united_wallers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_united_wallers_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_united_wallers_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_united_wallers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_united_wallers_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_united_wallers_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_united_wallers_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_united_wallers_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_united_wallers_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_united_wallers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_united_wallers_tt
		borders_united_wallers = no
	}
}

can_join_united_wallers = {
	can_join_united_wallers_generic = yes
	can_join_united_wallers_specific = yes
}

can_join_united_wallers_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_united_wallers = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_united_wallers = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_united_wallers }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.united_wallers_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.united_wallers_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_united_wallers = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_united_wallers_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_united_wallers_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# montana_enclave
is_montana_enclave_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_montana_enclave_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.montana_enclave_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_montana_enclave_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_montana_enclave_member_tt
		NOT = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes }
	}
}

is_montana_enclave_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_montana_enclave_leader_tt
		is_montana_enclave_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_montana_enclave_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_montana_enclave_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_montana_enclave_leader = yes }
	}
}

montana_enclave_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = montana_enclave_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.montana_enclave_leader
	}
}

does_montana_enclave_exist = {
	montana_enclave_exists = yes
}

montana_enclave_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = montana_enclave_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { montana_enclave_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_montana_enclave_not_exist = {
	montana_enclave_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_montana_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_montana_enclave_tt
		any_country = {
			is_montana_enclave_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_montana_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_montana_enclave_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_montana_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_montana_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_montana_enclave_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_montana_enclave_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_montana_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_montana_enclave_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_montana_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_montana_enclave_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_montana_enclave_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_montana_enclave_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_montana_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_montana_enclave_tt
		borders_montana_enclave = no
	}
}

can_join_montana_enclave = {
	can_join_montana_enclave_generic = yes
	can_join_montana_enclave_specific = yes
}

can_join_montana_enclave_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_montana_enclave = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_montana_enclave = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_montana_enclave }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.montana_enclave_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.montana_enclave_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_montana_enclave = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_montana_enclave_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_montana_enclave_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# northern_winds
is_northern_winds_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_winds_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.northern_winds_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_northern_winds_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_winds_member_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_winds_member = yes }
	}
}

is_northern_winds_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_northern_winds_leader_tt
		is_northern_winds_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_northern_winds_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_northern_winds_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_northern_winds_leader = yes }
	}
}

northern_winds_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_winds_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.northern_winds_leader
	}
}

does_northern_winds_exist = {
	northern_winds_exists = yes
}

northern_winds_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = northern_winds_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { northern_winds_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_northern_winds_not_exist = {
	northern_winds_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_northern_winds = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_northern_winds_tt
		any_country = {
			is_northern_winds_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_northern_winds = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_northern_winds_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_northern_winds_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_northern_winds = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_northern_winds_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_northern_winds_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_northern_winds = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_winds_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_winds_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_northern_winds_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_northern_winds_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_northern_winds_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_northern_winds = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_northern_winds_tt
		borders_northern_winds = no
	}
}

can_join_northern_winds = {
	can_join_northern_winds_generic = yes
	can_join_northern_winds_specific = yes
}

can_join_northern_winds_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_northern_winds = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_winds = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_northern_winds }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_winds_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.northern_winds_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_winds = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_northern_winds_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_northern_winds_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# allied_states
is_allied_states_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_allied_states_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.allied_states_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_allied_states_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_allied_states_member_tt
		NOT = { is_allied_states_member = yes }
	}
}

is_allied_states_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_allied_states_leader_tt
		is_allied_states_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_allied_states_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_allied_states_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_allied_states_leader = yes }
	}
}

allied_states_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = allied_states_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.allied_states_leader
	}
}

does_allied_states_exist = {
	allied_states_exists = yes
}

allied_states_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = allied_states_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { allied_states_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_allied_states_not_exist = {
	allied_states_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_allied_states = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_allied_states_tt
		any_country = {
			is_allied_states_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_allied_states = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_allied_states_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_allied_states_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_allied_states = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_allied_states_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_allied_states_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_allied_states = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_allied_states_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_allied_states_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_allied_states_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_allied_states_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_allied_states_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_allied_states = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_allied_states_tt
		borders_allied_states = no
	}
}

can_join_allied_states = {
	can_join_allied_states_generic = yes
	can_join_allied_states_specific = yes
}

can_join_allied_states_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_allied_states = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_allied_states = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_allied_states }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.allied_states_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.allied_states_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_allied_states = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_allied_states_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_allied_states_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# fifth_world
is_fifth_world_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_fifth_world_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.fifth_world_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_fifth_world_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_fifth_world_member_tt
		NOT = { is_fifth_world_member = yes }
	}
}

is_fifth_world_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_fifth_world_leader_tt
		is_fifth_world_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_fifth_world_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_fifth_world_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_fifth_world_leader = yes }
	}
}

fifth_world_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = fifth_world_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.fifth_world_leader
	}
}

does_fifth_world_exist = {
	fifth_world_exists = yes
}

fifth_world_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = fifth_world_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { fifth_world_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_fifth_world_not_exist = {
	fifth_world_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_fifth_world = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_fifth_world_tt
		any_country = {
			is_fifth_world_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_fifth_world = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_fifth_world_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_fifth_world_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_fifth_world = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_fifth_world_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_fifth_world_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_fifth_world = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_fifth_world_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_fifth_world_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_fifth_world_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_fifth_world_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_fifth_world_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_fifth_world = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_fifth_world_tt
		borders_fifth_world = no
	}
}

can_join_fifth_world = {
	can_join_fifth_world_generic = yes
	can_join_fifth_world_specific = yes
}

can_join_fifth_world_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_fifth_world = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_fifth_world = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_fifth_world }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.fifth_world_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.fifth_world_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_fifth_world = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_fifth_world_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_fifth_world_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_red_shield_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.red_shield_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_red_shield_member_tt
		NOT = { is_red_shield_member = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_red_shield_leader_tt
		is_red_shield_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_red_shield_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_red_shield_leader = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = red_shield_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.red_shield_leader
	}
}

	red_shield_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = red_shield_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { red_shield_exists = yes }
	}

	red_shield_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_red_shield_tt
		any_country = {
			is_red_shield_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_red_shield_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_red_shield_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_red_shield_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_red_shield_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_red_shield_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_red_shield_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_red_shield_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_red_shield_member = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_red_shield_tt
		borders_red_shield = no
	}
}

can_join_red_shield = {
	can_join_red_shield_generic = yes
	can_join_red_shield_specific = yes
}

can_join_red_shield_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_red_shield = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_red_shield = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_red_shield }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.red_shield_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.red_shield_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_red_shield_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_red_shield_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}

# wardens_of_white

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_wardens_of_white_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.wardens_of_white_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_wardens_of_white_member_tt
		NOT = { is_wardens_of_white_member = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_wardens_of_white_leader_tt
		is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_wardens_of_white_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_wardens_of_white_leader = yes }
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = wardens_of_white_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.wardens_of_white_leader
	}

	wardens_of_white_exists = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = wardens_of_white_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { wardens_of_white_exists = yes }
	}
}

	wardens_of_white_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_wardens_of_white = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_wardens_of_white_tt
		any_country = {
			is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_wardens_of_white = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_wardens_of_white_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_wardens_of_white = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_wardens_of_white_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_wardens_of_white = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_wardens_of_white_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_wardens_of_white_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_wardens_of_white_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_wardens_of_white_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_wardens_of_white = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_wardens_of_white_tt
		borders_wardens_of_white = no
	}
}

can_join_wardens_of_white = {
	can_join_wardens_of_white_generic = yes
	can_join_wardens_of_white_specific = yes
}

can_join_wardens_of_white_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_wardens_of_white = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_wardens_of_white = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_wardens_of_white }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.wardens_of_white_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.wardens_of_white_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_wardens_of_white = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_wardens_of_white_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_wardens_of_white_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

# miscounts
is_miscounts_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_miscounts_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.miscounts_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

is_not_miscounts_member = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_miscounts_member_tt
		NOT = { is_miscounts_member = yes }
	}
}

is_miscounts_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_miscounts_leader_tt
		is_miscounts_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_miscounts_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_miscounts_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_miscounts_leader = yes }
	}
}

miscounts_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = miscounts_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.miscounts_leader
	}
}

does_miscounts_exist = {
	miscounts_exists = yes
}

miscounts_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = miscounts_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { miscounts_exists = yes }
	}
}

does_miscounts_not_exist = {
	miscounts_does_not_exist = yes
}

has_border_war_with_miscounts = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_miscounts_tt
		any_country = {
			is_miscounts_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_miscounts = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_miscounts_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_miscounts_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_miscounts = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_miscounts_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_miscounts_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_miscounts = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_miscounts_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_miscounts_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_miscounts_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_miscounts_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_miscounts_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_miscounts = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_miscounts_tt
		borders_miscounts = no
	}
}

can_join_miscounts = {
	can_join_miscounts_generic = yes
	can_join_miscounts_specific = yes
}

can_join_miscounts_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_miscounts = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_miscounts = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_miscounts }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.miscounts_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.miscounts_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_miscounts = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_miscounts_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_miscounts_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_royal_accord_member_tt
		is_in_array = {
			array = GLOBAL.royal_accord_members
			value = THIS
		}
	}
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_royal_accord_member_tt
		NOT = { is_royal_accord_member = yes }
	}
}

is_royal_accord_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_royal_accord_leader_tt
		is_royal_accord_member = yes
		is_faction_leader = yes
	}
}

is_not_royal_accord_leader = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = is_not_royal_accord_leader_tt
		NOT = { is_royal_accord_leader = yes }
	}
}

royal_accord_exists = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = royal_accord_exists_tt
		has_variable = GLOBAL.royal_accord_leader
	}
}

does_royal_accord_exist = {
	royal_accord_exists = yes
}

royal_accord_does_not_exist = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = royal_accord_does_not_exist_tt
		NOT = { royal_accord_exists = yes }
	}
}

	royal_accord_does_not_exist = yes
}

	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_border_war_with_royal_accord_tt
		any_country = {
			is_royal_accord_member = yes
			has_border_war_with = PREV
		}
	}
}

has_war_with_royal_accord = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_war_with_royal_accord_tt
		any_enemy_country = {
			is_royal_accord_member = yes
		}
	}
}

at_peace_with_royal_accord = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = at_peace_with_royal_accord_tt
		NOT = {
			any_country = {
				is_royal_accord_member = yes
				OR = {
					has_war_with = PREV
					has_border_war_with = PREV
				}
			}
		}
	}
}

borders_royal_accord = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_royal_accord_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_royal_accord_member = yes
		}
	}
}

borders_royal_accord_preline = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = borders_royal_accord_preline_tt
		any_neighbor_country = {
			is_royal_accord_member = yes
		}
	}
}

does_not_border_royal_accord = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = does_not_border_royal_accord_tt
		borders_royal_accord = no
	}
}

can_join_royal_accord = {
	can_join_royal_accord_generic = yes
	can_join_royal_accord_specific = yes
}

can_join_royal_accord_generic = {
	# You must not be at war with the faction.
	at_peace_with_royal_accord = yes

	# Must have mutually positive relations.
	has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_royal_accord = yes

	# The leader must not hate you or vice-versa.
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = isolationist }
	NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_royal_accord }

	if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.royal_accord_leader = {
				is_brotherhood_nation = yes
			}
		}
		NOT = { has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel }
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = {
			var:GLOBAL.royal_accord_leader = {
				has_country_leader_with_trait = dislikes_brotherhood_of_steel
			}
		}
		is_not_brotherhood_nation = yes
	}
}

has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_royal_accord = {
	custom_trigger_tooltip = {
		tooltip = has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_royal_accord_tt
		any_other_country = {
			is_royal_accord_leader = yes
			has_mutually_positive_opinion_with_prev = yes
		}
	}
}


can_join_prev_faction = {
	if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_nova_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_nova_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_chosen_ones_member = yes } }
		can_join_chosen_ones = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_lanius_horde_member = yes } }
		can_join_lanius_horde = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_big_mt_member = yes } }
		can_join_big_mt = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes } }
		can_join_boneyard_brotherhood = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_united_front_member = yes } }
		can_join_united_front = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes } }
		can_join_western_brotherhood_of_steel = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_caesars_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_caesars_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes } }
		can_join_children_of_mexico = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes } }
		can_join_children_of_the_gate = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_daikatana_member = yes } }
		can_join_daikatana = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes } }
		can_join_daughters_of_hecate = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes } }
		can_join_denver_defense_network = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes } }
		can_join_earth_and_sky = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_empire_of_salt_member = yes } }
		can_join_empire_of_salt = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_equestria_member = yes } }
		can_join_equestria = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_faithful_member = yes } }
		can_join_faithful = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes } }
		can_join_fantasma_cartel = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_glass_league_member = yes } }
		can_join_glass_league = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_great_federation_member = yes } }
		can_join_great_federation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes } }
		can_join_great_plains_federation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_jungle_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_kaisers_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_kaisers_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_masters_new_army_member = yes } }
		can_join_masters_new_army = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_mesoamerican_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes } }
		can_join_the_fire_council = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_mojave_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_mojave_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_mormon_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_mormon_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes } }
		can_join_nevada_enclave = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_nevada_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_nevada_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_northern_league_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_league = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_mojave_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes } }
		can_join_phoenix_federation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_rio_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_rio_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes } }
		can_join_senators_little_helpers = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_great_confederation_member = yes } }
		can_join_great_confederation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes } }
		can_join_texan_economic_union = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes } }
		can_join_unbroken_coast = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_western_enclave_member = yes } }
		can_join_western_enclave = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes } }
		can_join_order_of_st_joseph = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes } }
		can_join_breach_ferals = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_white_sands_compact_member = yes } }
		can_join_white_sands_compact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_cartel_faction_member = yes } }
		can_join_cartel_faction = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes } }
		can_join_cascadia_pirates = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes } }
		can_join_transcascadia_republic = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_new_california_member = yes } }
		can_join_new_california = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_the_second_coalition_member = yes } }
		can_join_the_second_coalition = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes } }
		can_join_imperium_mexicanum = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_mexican_league_member = yes } }
		can_join_mexican_league = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_midnight_union_member = yes } }
		can_join_midnight_union = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_big_circle_member = yes } }
		can_join_big_circle = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_dharma_way_member = yes } }
		can_join_dharma_way = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_californian_hegemony_member = yes } }
		can_join_californian_hegemony = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_northern_congress_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_congress = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_road_warriors_member = yes } }
		can_join_road_warriors = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_synergy_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_synergy_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_vulpes_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_vulpes_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_aurelius_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_aurelius_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_lanius_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_lanius_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_hades_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_hades_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_lucius_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_lucius_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_malpais_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_malpais_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_northern_union_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_union = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes } }
		can_join_bloody_electorals = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes } }
		can_join_canadian_watchdogs = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes } }
		can_join_kingdom_of_manitoba = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_united_wallers_member = yes } }
		can_join_united_wallers = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes } }
		can_join_montana_enclave = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_northern_winds_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_winds = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_allied_states_member = yes } }
		can_join_allied_states = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_fifth_world_member = yes } }
		can_join_fifth_world = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_red_shield_member = yes } }
		can_join_red_shield = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_wardens_of_white_member = yes } }
		can_join_wardens_of_white = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_miscounts_member = yes } }
		can_join_miscounts = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { PREV = { is_royal_accord_member = yes } }
		can_join_royal_accord = yes
	}
	else = {
		always = yes
	}
}

can_join_root_faction = {
	if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_nova_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_nova_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_chosen_ones_member = yes } }
		can_join_chosen_ones = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_lanius_horde_member = yes } }
		can_join_lanius_horde = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_big_mt_member = yes } }
		can_join_big_mt = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_boneyard_brotherhood_member = yes } }
		can_join_boneyard_brotherhood = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_united_front_member = yes } }
		can_join_united_front = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_western_brotherhood_of_steel_member = yes } }
		can_join_western_brotherhood_of_steel = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_caesars_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_caesars_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_children_of_mexico_member = yes } }
		can_join_children_of_mexico = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_children_of_the_gate_member = yes } }
		can_join_children_of_the_gate = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_daikatana_member = yes } }
		can_join_daikatana = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_daughters_of_hecate_member = yes } }
		can_join_daughters_of_hecate = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_denver_defense_network_member = yes } }
		can_join_denver_defense_network = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_earth_and_sky_member = yes } }
		can_join_earth_and_sky = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_empire_of_salt_member = yes } }
		can_join_empire_of_salt = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_equestria_member = yes } }
		can_join_equestria = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_faithful_member = yes } }
		can_join_faithful = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_fantasma_cartel_member = yes } }
		can_join_fantasma_cartel = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_glass_league_member = yes } }
		can_join_glass_league = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_great_federation_member = yes } }
		can_join_great_federation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_great_plains_federation_member = yes } }
		can_join_great_plains_federation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_jungle_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_jungle_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_kaisers_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_kaisers_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_masters_new_army_member = yes } }
		can_join_masters_new_army = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_mesoamerican_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_mesoamerican_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_the_fire_council_member = yes } }
		can_join_the_fire_council = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_mojave_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_mojave_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_mormon_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_mormon_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_nevada_enclave_member = yes } }
		can_join_nevada_enclave = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_nevada_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_nevada_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_northern_league_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_league = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_northern_mojave_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_mojave_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_phoenix_federation_member = yes } }
		can_join_phoenix_federation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_rio_pact_member = yes } }
		can_join_rio_pact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_senators_little_helpers_member = yes } }
		can_join_senators_little_helpers = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_great_confederation_member = yes } }
		can_join_great_confederation = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_texan_economic_union_member = yes } }
		can_join_texan_economic_union = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_unbroken_coast_member = yes } }
		can_join_unbroken_coast = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_western_enclave_member = yes } }
		can_join_western_enclave = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_order_of_st_joseph_member = yes } }
		can_join_order_of_st_joseph = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_breach_ferals_member = yes } }
		can_join_breach_ferals = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_white_sands_compact_member = yes } }
		can_join_white_sands_compact = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_cartel_faction_member = yes } }
		can_join_cartel_faction = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_cascadia_pirates_member = yes } }
		can_join_cascadia_pirates = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_transcascadia_republic_member = yes } }
		can_join_transcascadia_republic = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_new_california_member = yes } }
		can_join_new_california = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_the_second_coalition_member = yes } }
		can_join_the_second_coalition = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_imperium_mexicanum_member = yes } }
		can_join_imperium_mexicanum = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_mexican_league_member = yes } }
		can_join_mexican_league = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_midnight_union_member = yes } }
		can_join_midnight_union = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_big_circle_member = yes } }
		can_join_big_circle = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_dharma_way_member = yes } }
		can_join_dharma_way = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_californian_hegemony_member = yes } }
		can_join_californian_hegemony = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_northern_congress_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_congress = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_road_warriors_member = yes } }
		can_join_road_warriors = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_synergy_alliance_member = yes } }
		can_join_synergy_alliance = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_vulpes_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_vulpes_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_aurelius_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_aurelius_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_lanius_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_lanius_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_hades_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_hades_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_lucius_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_lucius_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_malpais_legion_member = yes } }
		can_join_malpais_legion = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_northern_union_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_union = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_bloody_electorals_member = yes } }
		can_join_bloody_electorals = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_canadian_watchdogs_member = yes } }
		can_join_canadian_watchdogs = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_kingdom_of_manitoba_member = yes } }
		can_join_kingdom_of_manitoba = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_united_wallers_member = yes } }
		can_join_united_wallers = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_montana_enclave_member = yes } }
		can_join_montana_enclave = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_northern_winds_member = yes } }
		can_join_northern_winds = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_allied_states_member = yes } }
		can_join_allied_states = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_fifth_world_member = yes } }
		can_join_fifth_world = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_red_shield_member = yes } }
		can_join_red_shield = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_wardens_of_white_member = yes } }
		can_join_wardens_of_white = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_miscounts_member = yes } }
		can_join_miscounts = yes
	}
	else_if = {
		limit = { ROOT = { is_royal_accord_member = yes } }
		can_join_royal_accord = yes
	}
	else = {
		always = yes
	}
}
